overview: That’s how it could have been. The frivolous Mozart is no longer a secret. Those who give their body the right relaxation, whose mind is free for brilliant performances – see Mozart. Our Mozart can only be observed with his physical relaxation. He was also a great performer in the love life, and in this work no variant is omitted. Here one can see more, Mozart refines his genius and pounds ballast.
title: Secrets of Mozart
